Students who attend John Finney Continuation High School participated in several activities in honor of Black History Month. post_text: At the November 6th Governing Board meeting, VCUSD trustees approved a resolution recognizing November 11th as Veterans Day. There is no school on Monday. Please keep all veterans in your thoughts. FYI: Veterans Day falls annually on November 11th which is the anniversary of the signing of the armistice which ended hostilities between the Allied nations and Germany in 1918. On November 11, 1919, Armistice Day was commemorated for the first time. In June 1954, Congress changed the name from Armistice Day to Veterans Day and November 11th became the day to honor all American veterans wherever and whenever they had served.

The Vallejo City Unified School District administration and personnel will continue to monitor the air quality throughout the day. We will consult with the Vallejo police and fire departments to ensure that our students and staff are safe.

Thank you,

Dr. Adam Clark
Superintendent
